A great sequel to the legendary 1.6 that has itself become a classic. You are able to choose which map you wan't instead of being at the mercy of Valve's 24'7 Dust 2 match making service even though Dust 2 is the pinnacle of human achievement map wise. You are allowed to download free weapon and knife skins made by the community, free maps, free sprays (Non limited use and it can be porn if that's your thing) and free character models combined with unrestrained physics. If the pungent nonsense that's been tainting Valve and CSGO near the end of last year (2016) are bothering you then step back in time with CSS where everybody would say they would kill you IRL, had apparently slept with everybodies mothers and claimed you were hacking.
Its a fine game. But nothing better then the old CS.

This a game without reg.. This what people are saying when they can't kill anyone. But, they're still playing, so it's not a realy bad game!

I recommend this game because there are so many mods than COD and BF.. And more hackers who can't aim someone in head  but servers have their admins.

At the end, if you like RPG's game.. There also WCS mod for people want to have their own race to kill someone. And for people who want to be good with every weapons: GunGames is also a good mod. And here an exellent mod: Jailbreak. Completed. There is also Zombies mod: Zombies mod, Zombies escape and Zombie Riot (zombie riot is some round of zombies leveling..). Plus, Knife server and Minigames server. In addition, my best two: Bhoping servers and climbing servers.

There is more mods but they're not officials.

You like team vs. team? There is also servers for people who likes Scoutzknivez scrim (2v2 of scouts players), gungame scrim, public scrim, surf scrim..

So have fun!

当年cs的正统续作。不像csgo那么花哨，多了不少东西。
淳朴简单，充满回忆。
当年的网吧清一色cs，前无古人，后也很难有来者。
仅此纪念兄弟们逝去的青春。

Counter-Strike: Source reprises the player back into the Counter-Strike universe by utilizing the Source Engine, the successor to GoldSrc on which the original award-winning Counter-Strike and Counter-Strike: Condition Zero ran on. Many aspects and mechanics have stayed in CS: S, which involve more teamwork and strategy coupled with timing and steadying your shots to truly play the game. You play as Terrorists, who either hold hostages, plant bombs in bombsites, and/or eliminate the opposing team, Counter-Terrorists. As a Counter-Terrorist, your job is to either save the hostages, defuse planted bombs, and/or eliminate the Terrorists.

There are also many mods out there from various sites like Game Banana to expand your CS: S experience. Whether from model re-skins to custom community-made maps, the experience never ends thanks to the Source Engine.

If you own a legit copy of Garry's Mod, CS: S is a must for the majority of assets available in GMod require CS: S, although there is low-res fallback assets in case you don't have CS:S. Either way, CS: S is a must for a FPS player looking for teamwork and strategy within a quick playfield.
